content.rendered:
[mk_page_section bg_image=”https://www.mrjanitorialsupplies.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/about-us.jpg” bg_position=”center bottom” bg_stretch=”true” video_color_mask=”#2d2d2d” video_opacity=”0.7″ padding_top=”50″ padding_bottom=”0″ el_class=”custom-header-section” sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][vc_row_inner visibility=”hidden-sm” css=”.vc_custom_1449353724183{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”150px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h1″ color=”#ffffff” size=”50″ font_weight=”bold” font_family=”none” animation=”fade-in”]About Us[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ color=”#777777″ size=”30″ font_weight=”300″ font_family=”none”]Our Vision Statement: We are committed to our Stakeholders’ success. We develop long term relationships through profitability, effectiveness, efficiency and flexibility.
Stakeholders’ are the customers, employees, suppliers and the shareholders.[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text]

Mr. Janitorial Supplies is an ISO-9001 as well as an ISO-14001 registered company. Distributors of: Paper products, cleaning chemicals, garbage bags, health and safety products, matting, personal care products, packaging and shipping supplies.

Mr. Janitorial has been servicing Winnipeg for the past 31 years. We have a 32,000 square foot facility located in Winnipeg, MB. We are an ISO 9001:2008 registered company with a sound quality assurance program in place. We employ a staff of 19 and operate four trucks daily that service our existing customer base with same or next day service. We are continuously developing new business and realizing yearly growth. During our twenty years of business we have developed successful relationships with some of the industries top manufacturers such as 3M Canada Inc., S.C.A Tissue, Spartan Chemical, Nilfisk Advance, and Rubbermaid Commercial Products. We offer top quality products and service; realizing our responsibility to bring new and innovative products and solutions to our customers. Anyone can provide products for a price; we believe that providing the proper solutions to our customers is the key to maintaining successful customer relationships. Our wealth of experience in the supply industry has enabled us with the ability to look at a customer’s requirements and recommend the proper solution. Our reputation and growth proves this approach has been successful for both the customer and us.

Our Mission Statement: Our mission is to give value to all our Stakeholders. To our Customers, we provide service beyond distribution.

Our Quality Policy: It is the objective of Mr. Janitorial Supplies:

  • To provide our customers with a product or service that meets or exceeds their requirements
  • To provide an atmosphere in which continuous improvement is a normal part of each employee’s daily activities. Objectives are set and reviewed to help drive the improvement process.
  • To cultivate co-operation and mutual respect with all employee’s and suppliers.
